pyxtal_ml.descriptors.prdf module¶

class pyxtal_ml.descriptors.prdf.PRDF(crystal, symmetrize=True, R_max=6.0, R_bin=0.2, print_error=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Computes the pairwise RDF of a given crystal structure

Parameters:
  • crystal – A pymatgen crystal structure
  • symmetrize – bool, whether or not to symetrize the structure before computation
  • R_max – the cutoff distance
  • R_bin – bin length when computing the RDF
PRDF¶

the pairwise radial distribution function integrals

prdf_dict¶

the dictionary of pairwise radial distribution function integrals
